Comments_List: Topics revolved around monetary policy, fiscal policy, the international money and foreign exchange market. The class helps with understanding international financial events, and developing well-informed opinions about events in the news.
I acquired the skills and perspectives to analyze the international macroeconomics.
It involved a lot of real-world examples. Could use more feedback on homework problems.

This course started with the basic level of international accounting, but at the end of the course, we became able to use the basic model to analyze broad ranges of situations. The topics were very interesting, and the professor was good at teaching the content.
Anyone interested in international finance should take this class. There are not too many classes at Yale that deals with international economy, so this one is very good.
If you are interested in the foreign exchange market or international macroeconomics, you'll never regret by taking this course.
